# header

## 布局1
#### 预览

<div class="tui-header type1">
    <div class="tui-header-logo">
        <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="" name="logo">
    </div>
    <div class="tui-header-nav">
        <ul>
            <li>
                <a href="">首页</a>
            </li>
            <li>
                <a>一级菜单</a>
                <ul>
                    <li>
                        <a href="">二级菜单</a>
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="code-layout">
<div class="code-cont">

```html
<div class="tui-header">
    <div class="tui-header-logo">
        <img src="" alt="" name="logo">
    </div>
    <div class="tui-header-nav">
        <ul>
            <li>
                <a href="">首页</a>
            </li>
            <li>
                <a href="">一级菜单</a>
                <ul>
                    <li>
                        <a href="">二级菜单</a>
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>
```
</div>
<div class="code-cont">

```css
.tui-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    height: 100px;
    padding: 0 10px;
}
.tui-header-logo {
    width: 140px;
    height: 80px;
    margin-right: 20px;
}
.tui-header-nav {
    flex: 1;
}
.tui-header-nav ul {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}
.tui-header-nav > ul {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
}
.tui-header-nav > ul > li a {
    display: block;
    padding: 0.5em 0.5em;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: #282c34;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    user-select: none;
}
.tui-header-nav > ul > li > a {
    border-radius: 3px;
    padding: 0.5em 1.5em;
}
.tui-header-nav > ul > li a:hover {
    background-color: #f5f5f5;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.tui-header-nav > ul > li > a + ul {
    visibility: hidden;
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    min-width: 150px; 
    padding: 5px 0;
    border-radius: 3px;
    background: #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 12px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1);
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0.3s;
    transform-origin: 0% 0%;
    transform: rotateX(90deg);
}
.tui-header-nav > ul > li a:not([href])::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 10px;
    height: 10px;
    top: calc(50% - 5px);
    right: 4px;
    background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0.3s;
}
.tui-header-nav > ul > li:hover a:not([href])::after {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
}
.tui-header-nav > ul > li:hover > ul {
    visibility: visible;
    transform: rotateX(0deg);
}
```
</div>
</div>

<style>
    .tui-header.type1 {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        max-width: 1200px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        height: 100px;
        padding: 0 10px;
    }
    .tui-header-logo {
        width: 140px;
        height: 80px;
        margin-right: 20px;
    }
    .tui-header-nav {
        flex: 1;
    }
    .tui-header-nav ul {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }
    .tui-header-nav > ul {
        width: 100%;
        display: flex;
    }
    .tui-header-nav > ul > li a {
        display: block;
        padding: 0.5em 0.5em;
        font-size: 14px;
        font-weight: 400;
        color: #282c34;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        user-select: none;
    }
    .tui-header-nav > ul > li > a {
        border-radius: 3px;
        padding: 0.5em 1.5em;
    }
    .tui-header-nav > ul > li a:hover {
        background-color: #f5f5f5;
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }
    .tui-header-nav > ul > li > a + ul {
        visibility: hidden;
        position: absolute;
        z-index: 2;
        min-width: 150px; 
        padding: 5px 0;
        border-radius: 3px;
        background: #fff;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 12px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1);
        transition: all 0.2s ease 0.3s;
        transform-origin: 0% 0%;
        transform: rotateX(90deg);
    }
    .tui-header-nav > ul > li a:not([href])::after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 10px;
        height: 10px;
        top: calc(50% - 5px);
        right: 4px;
        background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
        transition: all 0.2s ease 0.3s;
    }
    .tui-header-nav > ul > li:hover a:not([href])::after {
        transform: rotate(180deg);
    }
    .tui-header-nav > ul > li:hover > ul {
        visibility: visible;
        transform: rotateX(0deg);
    }
</style>
